I need more of this. To anyone that is reading this, please, help me out with some more revenge NTR. I just realized that my cure for NTR is revenge NTR itself. 
I want to see the MC’s ex suffer instead of the MC forgiving them and just move on with their lives. I want cheaters to be caught in the act. I want them to feel guilt, regret, remorse, finally realize that what they did was wrong, and seeing them think that there may be a chance for them to fix it even tho there isn’t. I want to see them beg for mercy and forgiveness. I want to see the look on their faces after the MC not forgiving them but instead exposing and humiliating them in front of their families and friends. I want to see the MC turn their lives into a living hell and make them suffer till the day they die.
